description: This file appears to be a C++ source file (implementation file) for the class RialtoConnector, part of the WPEFramework namespace. It contains method definitions related to managing server sessions, application states, and connectors in a media or server management context.

classes.name: RialtoConnector
classes.description: Main class responsible for managing server sessions, application states, and session lifecycle within the Rialto framework.

methods.name: void initialize()
methods.description: Initializes the RialtoConnector, setting up configuration and server manager service.

methods.name: bool createAppSession(const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Creates a new application session given callsign, displayName, and appId.

methods.name: bool resumeSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Resumes the session with the specified callsign, changing its state to ACTIVE if currently inactive.

methods.name: bool suspendSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Suspends the session with the specified callsign by changing its state to INACTIVE if currently active.

methods.name: const RialtoServerStates getCurrentAppState(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the application identified by callsign.

methods.name: bool deactivateSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Deactivates the session for the given callsign, setting it to NOT_RUNNING if currently active or inactive.

methods.name: void stateChanged(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state)
methods.description: Callback to report a change in application state, updating the internal map and notifying condition variable.

methods.name: bool waitForStateChange(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state,int timeoutMillis)
methods.description: Blocks until the specified application's state changes to the target state or timeout occurs.

ctags.name: createAppSession
ctags.signature: (const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)

ctags.name: waitForStateChange
ctags.pattern: /^    bool RialtoConnector::waitForStateChange(const std::string& appId, const RialtoServerStates&/
